txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Extremely sharp claws from the cave-claws in the western stretches of the Trollshaws. Deliver the items to Heithur Ironfist at Barachen's Camp, south of the road in the western Trollshaws.
'They are not much, but I am certain that I can work with them. Thank you.'

'I am going to try to make some traps, but there is no forge here for me to work metal. Instead, I was thinking of making them from claws and wood. The wood is easy to get but strong and sharp claws will need to come from the cave-claws.'
Thorin's Hall Task: Extremely Sharp Claws
Heithur Ironfist, in the company and relative safety of Barachen's Camp, awaits your return with extremely sharp claws.
Deliver the extremely sharp claws to Heithur Ironfist at Barachen's Camp in the Trollshaws

You have accepted a task to collect extremely sharp claws from the cave-claws in the western stretches of the Trollshaws. You are to deliver the items to Heithur Ironfist, a dwarf taking refuge at Barachen's Camp, south of the road in the western Trollshaws.
Wanted: Extremely sharp claws from the cave-claws in the western stretches of the Trollshaws.
